metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7712 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The validateInputImageSize function in modules/imgcodecs/src/loadsave.cpp in OpenCV 3.4.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure) because (size.height <= (1<<20)) may be false. Note: “OpenCV CV_Assert is not an assertion (C-like assert()), it is regular C++ exception which can raised in case of invalid or non-supported parameters.”

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> Upstream marked it as invalid: https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/10998#issuecomment-370722738

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
